post.title: ガンマ関数の性質
post.content:
ガンマ関数の定義と性質

[定義]

s>0s>0s>0 に対して、

Γ(s)=∫0∞xs−1e−xdx\Gamma(s) = \int_0^\infty x^{s-1}e^{-x}dxΓ(s)=∫0∞​xs−1e−xdx

性質

  • s>1s>1s>1のとき、Γ(s)=(s−1)Γ(s−1)\Gamma(s) = (s-1)\Gamma(s-1)Γ(s)=(s−1)Γ(s−1)

[証明]

Γ(s)=∫0∞xs−1e−xdx=[xs−1(−e−x)]0∞+∫0∞(s−1)xs−2e−xdx=(s−1)∫0∞xs−2e−xdx=(s−1)Γ(s−1)\begin{aligned} \Gamma(s) &= \int_0^\infty x^{s-1}e^{-x}dx \\ &= [x^{s-1}(-e^{-x})]_0^\infty + \int_0^\infty(s-1)x^{s-2}e^{-x}dx \\ &= (s-1)\int_0^\infty x^{s-2}e^{-x}dx \\ &= (s-1)\Gamma(s-1) \end{aligned}Γ(s)​=∫0∞​xs−1e−xdx=[xs−1(−e−x)]0∞​+∫0∞​(s−1)xs−2e−xdx=(s−1)∫0∞​xs−2e−xdx=(s−1)Γ(s−1)​
  • s∈Ns \in \mathbb{N}s∈N のとき Γ(s)=(s−1)!\Gamma(s) = (s-1)!Γ(s)=(s−1)!

[証明]

Γ(s)=(s−1)Γ(s−1)=(s−1)(s−2)⋯1⋅Γ(1)=(s−1)!\begin{aligned} \Gamma(s) &= (s-1)\Gamma(s-1) \\ &= (s-1)(s-2)\cdots1\cdot\Gamma(1)\\ &= (s-1)! \end{aligned}Γ(s)​=(s−1)Γ(s−1)=(s−1)(s−2)⋯1⋅Γ(1)=(s−1)!​
  • Γ(12)=π\Gamma(\frac{1}{2}) = \sqrt{\pi}Γ(21​)=π​

[証明]

Γ(12)=∫0∞x−12e−xdx\begin{aligned} \Gamma(\frac{1}{2}) &= \int_0^\infty x^{-\frac{1}{2}}e^{-x}dx \end{aligned}Γ(21​)​=∫0∞​x−21​e−xdx​

x=t2x = t^2x=t2 とおくと、積分区間は
xxx 0→∞0 \rightarrow \infty0→∞
ttt 0→∞0 \rightarrow \infty0→∞

また、

dx=2tdtdx = 2tdtdx=2tdt

より、

Γ(12)=∫0∞x−12e−xdx=∫0∞t−1e−t2⋅2tdt=2∫0∞e−t2dt=∫−∞∞e−t2dt∵ガウス積分=π\begin{aligned} \Gamma(\frac{1}{2}) &= \int_0^\infty x^{-\frac{1}{2}}e^{-x}dx \\ &= \int_0^\infty t^{-1}e^{-t^2}\cdot 2tdt \\ &= 2 \int_0^\infty e^{-t^2}dt \\ &= \int_{-\infty}^\infty e^{-t^2}dt & \because\text{ガウス積分}\\ &= \sqrt{\pi} \end{aligned}Γ(21​)​=∫0∞​x−21​e−xdx=∫0∞​t−1e−t2⋅2tdt=2∫0∞​e−t2dt=∫−∞∞​e−t2dt=π​​∵ガウス積分​
